chapters.title: Chapter 1: Seeds of Shadow
chapters.info: Alwhin, p. 46 (31)—Sharp-faced, blue-eyed Seanchan woman with a “perpetual glower.” The left side of her head is shaven, the other side long and brown-haired. She is a sul'dam, and has been raised to a Voice of the Blood. No other sul'dam has ever been raised to the Blood before, much less to a Voice of the Blood, but Alwhin knows too much to be a simple sul'dam: she knows that sul'dam can be controlled via a'dam. She was intended to hold Nynaeve's leash when the Seanchan attempted to collar her outside the Ways with Liandrin's assistance.
